about_the_game:
Veliri. Once a lifeless planet that has seen much in its lifetime, it is now once again torn apart by war for influence between three factions of a once united synthetic life form - the militarized Replics, the inquisitive Explores, and the purposeful Reverses. Imitating their creators, three intelligent AI centers have formed their own society. Research, trade, law, crime, war. And you.

Dive into the living and evolving open world of the economic online RPG genre "privateer" with elements of survival and answer the question - who are you in this world?

FREEDOM OF CHOICE

Will you stand alone, take someone's side, or challenge everyone? Will you be an Explorer, Trader, Manufacturer, Builder, Warrior, or Bandit? Or maybe you want to uncover the secrets of this place's history, facing those who were here before you?

There are no restrictions in this game, you can do what you like. This gives you complete freedom of choice and action.

A LIVING AND EVOLVING WORLD

The game world is alive and constantly changing both with and without other players through the actions of NPCs.

The global war for territories and reputation never stops for a minute.

Sectors constantly change hands from one faction to another.

New structures appear in each of them - both military and other purposes, affecting both the strength of the faction and the economy.

A LIVING ECONOMY

Speaking of the economy. While some fight for territories, others make money on it. After all, the economy is also a battlefield. Global prices for everything in the game change from any influence on them by enterprising solo traders and entire corporations that are born and disappear here in real-time. Taxes, duties, speculation, dumping - all this is familiar to both players and NPCs.

A WIDE CHOICE OF TRANSPORT

To participate in all this, you will need wheels. Or maybe tracks? Or do you prefer antigravs? The game will allow you to create your unique vehicle, choosing from a multitude of parts, bodies, and even weapons. You can't go anywhere here without weapons. Will you buy everything you need, or create it yourself? Or maybe find or take by force?

HARDCORE GAMEPLAY

Just remember that everything you find or create - you can also easily lose, to start over again. What you lost - others will find. What others have lost - you will find.

UNITE

Unite with other players to achieve common goals, participate in wars, capture sectors, build bases, and much more!

Do you dare to survive on this planet? Veliri awaits you!
